::Epyon/Hot Rod::

"We cant do much of anything while we are in the IGL. Just dont kill
him. We may be able to save him later. Is that clear?"

Hot Rod nodded.
"Ok, but that could be hard if he comes after us. Some of these Preds
and Deceps are just insane. Remember what happaned in my last match."
